sourcesContent:
<template>

  <el-container>
    <el-main>
      <cus-page-title :label="pageTitle" />
      <cus-product-info></cus-product-info>
      <el-form ref="form" :model="form" label-width="auto"  :rules="rules">
        <cus-form-title :label="formTitle"></cus-form-title>
        <el-row :gutter="10" >
          <cus-col>
            <el-form-item :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pdInsuOrgCode')" prop="pdInsuOrgCode">
              <el-input :placeholder="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pdInsuOrgCode')" v-model="form.pdInsuOrgCode" :disabled="true"></el-input>
            </el-form-item>
          </cus-col>
          <cus-col>
            <el-form-item :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pdCircCode')" prop="pdCircCode">
              <el-input v-model="form.pdCircCode" maxlength="500" show-word-limit></el-input>
            </el-form-item>
          </cus-col>
          <cus-col>
            <el-form-item :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pdRptState')" prop="pdRptState">
              <cus-select :codetype="'pdjgrepstate'" v-model="form.pdRptState"></cus-select>
            </el-form-item>
          </cus-col>
        </el-row>
        <el-row :gutter="10" >
          <cus-col>
            <el-form-item :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pdRptDate')" prop="pdRptDate">
              <el-date-picker
                v-model="form.pdRptDate"
                type="date"
                value-format="yyyy-MM-dd"
                :placeholder="$t('i18nView.datePlaceholder')">
              </el-date-picker>
            </el-form-item>
          </cus-col>
          <cus-col>
            <el-form-item :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pdStartDate')" prop="pdStartDate">
              <el-date-picker
                v-model="form.pdStartDate"
                type="date"
                value-format="yyyy-MM-dd"
                :placeholder="$t('i18nView.datePlaceholder')">
              </el-date-picker>
            </el-form-item>
          </cus-col>
          <cus-col>
            <el-form-item :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pdStopDate')" prop="pdStopDate">
              <el-date-picker
                v-model="form.pdStopDate"
                type="date"
                value-format="yyyy-MM-dd"
                :placeholder="$t('i18nView.datePlaceholder')">
              </el-date-picker>
            </el-form-item>
          </cus-col>
        </el-row>
        <el-row :gutter="10" >
          <cus-col>
            <el-form-item :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pdType')" prop="pdType" >
              <cus-select :codetype="'pdjgrisktype'" v-model="form.pdType"
                          @change="typeRegionSelect" :disabled="true"></cus-select>
            </el-form-item>
          </cus-col>
          <cus-col>
            <el-form-item :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pdDetailType')" prop="pdDetailType" >
              <cus-select :codetype="'pdjgdetype'" v-model="form.pdDetailType"
                          :filter="finelinesRegionFilter" :disabled="true"></cus-select>
            </el-form-item>
          </cus-col>
          <cus-col>
            <el-form-item :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.medicalInsuranceType')" prop="medicalInsuranceType">
              <cus-select :codetype="'MedicalInsuranceType'" v-model="form.medicalInsuranceType" ></cus-select>
            </el-form-item>
          </cus-col>
        </el-row>
        <el-row :gutter="10" >
          <cus-col>
            <el-form-item :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pdDsType')" prop="pdDsType" >
              <cus-select :codetype="'ProductDesignType'"  v-model="form.pdDsType" :disabled="true"></cus-select>
            </el-form-item>
          </cus-col>
          <cus-col>
            <el-form-item  :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pdGrpFlag')" prop="pdGrpFlag" >
              <cus-select :codetype="'pdjgriskna'" v-model="form.pdGrpFlag" :disabled="true"></cus-select>
            </el-form-item>
          </cus-col>
          <cus-col>
            <el-form-item  :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pdMainSubFlag')" prop="pdMainSubFlag" >
<!--              <el-radio v-model="form.pdMainSubFlag" label="M" :disabled="true">主险</el-radio>-->
<!--              <el-radio v-model="form.pdMainSubFlag" label="R" :disabled="true">附加险</el-radio>-->
              <cus-radio :codetype="'principalRiskFlag'" v-model="form.pdMainSubFlag" :disabled="true"></cus-radio>
            </el-form-item>
          </cus-col>
        </el-row>
        <el-row :gutter="10" >
          <cus-col>
            <el-form-item :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pdTermType')" prop="pdTermType">
              <cus-select :codetype="'pdjgbxqx'" v-model="form.pdTermType"></cus-select>
            </el-form-item>
          </cus-col>
          <cus-col>
            <el-form-item :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pdGuarRenePeriod')"  prop="pdGuarRenePeriod">
              <el-input type="number" v-model="form.pdGuarRenePeriod" :placeholder="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pleaseEnterNumber')" :disabled="form.pdGuarReneFlag==='N'">
                <cus-select class="cst" :codetype="'saledes'" slot="append" v-model="form.pdGuarRenePeriodUnit"></cus-select>
              </el-input>
            </el-form-item>
          </cus-col>
          <cus-col></cus-col>
        </el-row>
        <el-row :gutter="10" >
          <cus-col>
            <el-form-item :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pdAssumIntRate')" prop="pdAssumIntRate">
              <el-input type="number" v-model="form.pdAssumIntRate" :placeholder="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pleaseEnterNumber')">
                <template slot="suffix">%</template>
              </el-input>
            </el-form-item>
          </cus-col>
          <cus-col>
            <el-form-item :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pdMinIntRate')" prop="pdMinIntRate">
              <el-input type="number" v-model="form.pdMinIntRate" :placeholder="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pleaseEnterNumber')">
                <template slot="suffix">%</template>
              </el-input>
            </el-form-item>
          </cus-col>
          <cus-col>
            <el-form-item :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pdReneType')" prop="pdReneType">
              <cus-select :codetype="'pdjgxqqx'" v-model="form.pdReneType" ></cus-select>
            </el-form-item>
          </cus-col>
        </el-row>
        <el-row :gutter="10" >
          <cus-col>
            <el-form-item :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pdTaxRate')" prop="pdTaxRate">
              <el-input type="number" :placeholder="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pleaseEnterNumber')" v-model="form.pdTaxRate">
                <template slot="suffix">%</template>
              </el-input>
            </el-form-item>
          </cus-col>
          <cus-col>
            <el-form-item :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pdTaxRateVailDate')" prop="pdTaxRateVailDate">
              <el-date-picker
                v-model="form.pdTaxRateVailDate"
                type="date"
                value-format="yyyy-MM-dd"
                :placeholder="$t('i18nView.datePlaceholder')">
              </el-date-picker>
            </el-form-item>
          </cus-col>
          <cus-col>
            <el-form-item :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pdTaxRateExpDate')" prop="pdTaxRateExpDate">
              <el-date-picker
                v-model="form.pdTaxRateExpDate"
                type="date"
                value-format="yyyy-MM-dd"
                :placeholder="$t('i18nView.datePlaceholder')">
              </el-date-picker>
            </el-form-item>
          </cus-col>
        </el-row>
        <el-row :gutter="10" >
          <cus-col>
            <el-form-item :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pdLoanRate')" prop="pdLoanRate">
              <el-input v-model="form.pdLoanRate" type="number" :placeholder="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pleaseEnterNumber')">
                <template slot="suffix">%</template>
              </el-input>
            </el-form-item>

          </cus-col>
          <cus-col>
            <el-form-item :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pdLoanPeriod')" prop="pdLoanPeriod">
              <el-input :placeholder="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pleaseEnterNumber')" type="number" v-model="form.pdLoanPeriod">
                <template slot="suffix">{{$t('i18nView.month')}}</template>
              </el-input>
            </el-form-item>

          </cus-col>
          <cus-col>
            <el-form-item :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pdHesiDays')" prop="pdHesiDays">
              <el-input :placeholder="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pleaseEnterNumber')" type="number" v-model="form.pdHesiDays">
                <template slot="suffix">{{$t('i18nView.day')}}</template>
              </el-input>
            </el-form-item>

          </cus-col>
        </el-row>
        <el-row :gutter="10" >
          <cus-col>
            <el-form-item :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pdDivType')">
<!--              <cus-select :codetype="'BonusType'" v-model="form.pdDivType" ></cus-select>-->
              <cus-radio :codetype="'BonusType'" v-model="form.pdDivType"></cus-radio>
            </el-form-item>
          </cus-col>
          <cus-col>
            <el-form-item :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pdAnnuType')" prop="pdAnnuType">
              <cus-select :codetype="'pdjgnjlq'" v-model="form.pdAnnuType"></cus-select>
            </el-form-item>
          </cus-col>
          <cus-col>
            <el-form-item :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pdAnnuPeriod')" prop="pdAnnuPeriod">
              <el-input :placeholder="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pleaseEnterNumber')" type="number" v-model="form.pdAnnuPeriod">
                <template style="background-color: white" slot="suffix">{{$t('i18nView.year')}}</template>
              </el-input>
            </el-form-item>
          </cus-col>
        </el-row>
        <el-row :gutter="10" >
          <cus-col>
            <el-form-item :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pdOpenArea')" prop="pdOpenArea">
              <cus-select :codetype="'pdjgkbdq'" v-model="form.pdOpenArea"></cus-select>
            </el-form-item>
          </cus-col>
          <cus-col>
            <el-form-item :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pdSaleChan')" prop="pdSaleChan">
              <cus-multi-select :codetype="'pdjgxsqd'" v-model="form.pdSaleChan"></cus-multi-select>
            </el-form-item>

          </cus-col>
          <cus-col>
            <el-form-item :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pdSex')" prop="pdSex">
              <cus-select :codetype="'pdjgsex'" v-model="form.pdSex" ></cus-select>
            </el-form-item>
          </cus-col>
        </el-row>
        <el-row :gutter="10" >

          <cus-col>
            <el-form-item :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pdMinAppAge')" prop="pdMinAppAge">
              <el-input v-model="form.pdMinAppAge" type="number" :placeholder="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pleaseEnterNumber')">
                <template slot="suffix">{{$t('i18nView.age')}}</template>
              </el-input>
            </el-form-item>

          </cus-col>
          <cus-col>
            <el-form-item :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pdMaxAppAge')" prop="pdMaxAppAge">
              <el-input v-model="form.pdMaxAppAge" type="number" :placeholder="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pleaseEnterNumber')">
                <template slot="suffix">{{$t('i18nView.age')}}</template>
              </el-input>
            </el-form-item>

          </cus-col>
          <cus-col>
            <el-form-item :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pdWaitPeriod')" prop="pdWaitPeriod" >
              <el-input v-model="form.pdWaitPeriod"  type="number" :placeholder="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pleaseEnterNumber')" >
                <template slot="suffix">{{$t('i18nView.day')}}</template>
              </el-input>
            </el-form-item>
          </cus-col>
        </el-row>
        <el-row :gutter="10" >
          <cus-col>
            <el-form-item :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pdSpecBusFlag')" prop="pdSpecBusFlag">
              <el-switch
                v-model="form.pdSpecBusFlag"

                active-value="Y"
                inactive-value="N">
              </el-switch>
            </el-form-item>
          </cus-col>
          <cus-col>
              <el-form-item :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pdSpecBusCode')" prop="pdSpecBusCode">
                <cus-select :codetype="'pdjgtxyw'"  v-model="form.pdSpecBusCode" ></cus-select>
              </el-form-item>
          </cus-col>
          <cus-col>
            <el-form-item :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pdMediCovArea')" prop="pdMediCovArea">
              <cus-select :codetype="'pdjgylfg'" v-model="form.pdMediCovArea"></cus-select>
            </el-form-item>
          </cus-col>
        </el-row>
        <el-row :gutter="10" >
          <cus-col>
            <el-form-item :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pdMajorPayMode')" prop="pdMajorPayMode">
              <cus-select :codetype="'pdjgzjlx'" v-model="form.pdMajorPayMode"></cus-select>
            </el-form-item>
          </cus-col>
          <cus-col>
            <el-form-item :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pdMajBnftAftFlag')" prop="pdMajBnftAftFlag">
              <el-switch
                v-model="form.pdMajBnftAftFlag"

                active-value="Y"
                inactive-value="N">
              </el-switch>
            </el-form-item>
          </cus-col>
          <cus-col>
            <el-form-item :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pdMajPayNum')" prop="pdMajPayNum">
              <el-input :placeholder="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pleaseEnterNumber')" type="number" v-model="form.pdMajPayNum"></el-input>
            </el-form-item>
          </cus-col>
        </el-row>
        <el-row :gutter="10" >
          <cus-col>
            <el-form-item :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pdMajDisCovNum')" prop="pdMajDisCovNum">
              <el-input :placeholder="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pleaseEnterNumber')" type="number" v-model="form.pdMajDisCovNum"></el-input>
            </el-form-item>
          </cus-col>

          <cus-col>
            <el-form-item :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pdMilDisCovNum')" prop="pdMilDisCovNum">
              <el-input :placeholder="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pleaseEnterNumber')" type="number" v-model="form.pdMilDisCovNum"></el-input>
            </el-form-item>
          </cus-col>

          <cus-col>
            <el-form-item :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pdMilPayNum')" prop="pdMilPayNum">
              <el-input :placeholder="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pleaseEnterNumber')"  type="number" v-model="form.pdMilPayNum"></el-input>
            </el-form-item>
          </cus-col>
        </el-row>
        <el-row :gutter="10" >
          <cus-col>
            <el-form-item :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pdPayRateInMed')" prop="pdPayRateInMed">
              <el-input :placeholder="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pleaseEnterNumber')" type="number" v-model="form.pdPayRateInMed">
                <template slot="suffix">%</template>
              </el-input>
            </el-form-item>

          </cus-col>
          <cus-col>
            <el-form-item :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pdPayRateOutMed')" prop="pdPayRateOutMed">
              <el-input :placeholder="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pleaseEnterNumber')" type="number" v-model="form.pdPayRateOutMed">
                <template slot="suffix">%</template>
              </el-input>
            </el-form-item>

          </cus-col>
          <cus-col>

          </cus-col>
        </el-row>
        <el-row :gutter="10" >
          <cus-col>
            <el-form-item :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pdBeduType')" prop="pdBeduType">
              <cus-select :codetype="'pdjgmpe'" v-model="form.pdBeduType"></cus-select>
            </el-form-item>
          </cus-col>
          <cus-col>
            <el-form-item :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pdBeduInMed')" prop="pdBeduInMed">
              <el-input :placeholder="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pleaseEnterNumber')" type="number" v-model="form.pdBeduInMed">
                <template slot="suffix">{{$t('i18nView.yuan')}}</template>
              </el-input>
            </el-form-item>
          </cus-col>
          <cus-col>
            <el-form-item :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pdBeduOutMed')" prop="pdBeduOutMed">
              <el-input :placeholder="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pleaseEnterNumber')" type="number" v-model="form.pdBeduOutMed">
                <template slot="suffix">{{$t('i18nView.yuan')}}</template>
              </el-input>
            </el-form-item>

          </cus-col>
        </el-row>
        <el-row :gutter="10" >
          <cus-col>
            <el-form-item :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pdSpecBusCode')" prop="pdSpecBusCode">
              <cus-select :codetype="'pdjgtxyw'" v-model="form.pdSpecBusCode"></cus-select>
            </el-form-item>
          </cus-col>
          <cus-col>
            <el-form-item :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pdBeduRateInMed')" prop="pdBeduRateInMed">
              <el-input :placeholder="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pleaseEnterNumber')" type="number" v-model="form.pdBeduRateInMed">
                <template slot="suffix">%</template>
              </el-input>
            </el-form-item>
          </cus-col>
          <cus-col>
            <el-form-item :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pdBeduRateOutMed')" prop="pdBeduRateOutMed">
              <el-input :placeholder="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pleaseEnterNumber')" type="number" v-model="form.pdBeduRateOutMed">
                <template slot="suffix">%</template>
              </el-input>
            </el-form-item>
          </cus-col>
        </el-row>
        <el-row :gutter="10" >
          <cus-col>
            <el-form-item :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pdDesHospFlag')" prop="">
              <el-switch
                v-model="form.pdDesHospFlag"

                active-value="Y"
                inactive-value="N">
              </el-switch>
            </el-form-item>
          </cus-col>
          <cus-col>
            <el-form-item :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pdSpecHosFlag')" prop="pdSpecHosFlag">
              <el-switch
                v-model="form.pdSpecHosFlag"

                active-value="Y"
                inactive-value="N">
              </el-switch>
            </el-form-item>
          </cus-col>
          <cus-col>
            <el-form-item :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pdOperAlloFlag')" prop="pdOperAlloFlag">
              <el-switch
                v-model="form.pdOperAlloFlag"

                active-value="Y"
                inactive-value="N">
              </el-switch>
            </el-form-item>
          </cus-col>
        </el-row>
        <el-row :gutter="10" >
          <cus-col>
            <el-form-item :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pdBrkThrSocFlag')" prop="pdBrkThrSocFlag">
              <el-switch
                v-model="form.pdBrkThrSocFlag"

                active-value="Y"
                inactive-value="N">
              </el-switch>
            </el-form-item>
          </cus-col>
          <cus-col>
            <el-form-item :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pdVipClinicFlag')" prop="pdBrkThrSocFlag">
              <el-switch
                v-model="form.pdVipClinicFlag"

                active-value="Y"
                inactive-value="N">
              </el-switch>
            </el-form-item>
          </cus-col>
          <cus-col>
            <el-form-item :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pdInsuAccFlag')" prop="pdInsuAccFlag">
              <el-switch
                v-model="form.pdInsuAccFlag"

                active-value="Y"
                inactive-value="N">
              </el-switch>
            </el-form-item>
          </cus-col>

        </el-row>
        <el-row :gutter="10" >


          <cus-col>
            <el-form-item :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pdPolicyFeeFlag')" prop="pdPolicyFeeFlag">
              <el-switch
                v-model="form.pdPolicyFeeFlag"

                active-value="Y"
                inactive-value="N" :disabled="true">
              </el-switch>
            </el-form-item>
          </cus-col>
          <cus-col>
            <el-form-item :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pdInitFeeFlag')" prop="pdInitFeeFlag">
              <el-switch
                v-model="form.pdInitFeeFlag"

                active-value="Y"
                inactive-value="N" :disabled="true">
              </el-switch>
            </el-form-item>
          </cus-col>
          <cus-col>
            <el-form-item :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pdChgFeeFlag')" prop="pdChgFeeFlag">
              <el-switch
                v-model="form.pdChgFeeFlag"

                active-value="Y"
                inactive-value="N">
              </el-switch>
            </el-form-item>
          </cus-col>
        </el-row>

        <el-row :gutter="10" >
          <cus-col>
            <el-form-item :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pdFatca')" prop="pdFatca">
              <el-switch
                v-model="form.pdFatca"

                active-value="Y"
                inactive-value="N">
              </el-switch>
            </el-form-item>
          </cus-col>
          <cus-col>
            <el-form-item :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pdCrs')" prop="pdCrs">
              <el-switch
                v-model="form.pdCrs"

                active-value="Y"
                inactive-value="N">
              </el-switch>
            </el-form-item>
          </cus-col>
          <cus-col>
            <el-form-item :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pdOiu')" prop="pdOiu">
              <el-switch
                v-model="form.pdOiu"

                active-value="Y"
                inactive-value="N">
              </el-switch>
            </el-form-item>
          </cus-col>
        </el-row>
        <el-row :gutter="10" >
          <cus-col>
            <el-form-item :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pdPsc')" prop="pdPsc">
              <el-switch
                v-model="form.pdPsc"

                active-value="Y"
                inactive-value="N">
              </el-switch>
            </el-form-item>
          </cus-col>
          <cus-col>
            <el-form-item :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pdFna')" prop="pdFna">
              <el-switch
                v-model="form.pdFna"

                active-value="Y"
                inactive-value="N">
              </el-switch>
            </el-form-item>
          </cus-col>
          <cus-col>
          </cus-col>
        </el-row>
        <cus-form-title :label="formTitle1"></cus-form-title>
        <cus-table-title :label="tableTitle" />
        <el-table ref="singleTable1" :data="singleTable1" @row-click=""
                  size="mini" element-loading-text="Loading" border
                  align="center" class="wraper-table" highlight-current-row style=" margin: 0 0 0 0">
          <el-table-column :label="$t('table.id')" align="center" width="50px">
            <template slot-scope="scope">{{scope.$index + 1}}</template>
          </el-table-column>
          <el-table-column :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.details')" align="center" prop="">
            <template slot-scope="scope">
              <el-button dialog-disable="disable"  size="small" @click="showThis(scope.row)" type="text">>></el-button>
            </template>
          </el-table-column>
          <el-table-column :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.securityType')" align="center"
                           prop="pdBnftType">
            <template v-slot="scope">
              <span> {{scope.row.pdBnftType | filter_pdBnftType}}</span>
            </template>
          </el-table-column>
          <el-table-column :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.securityDetailsType')" align="center"
                           prop="pdBnftDetailType">
            <template v-slot="scope">
              <span v-show="scope.row.pdBnftType=='C'">{{ scope.row.pdBnftDetailType | filter_pdBnftDetailType1}}</span>
              <span v-show="scope.row.pdBnftType=='A'">{{ scope.row.pdBnftDetailType | filter_pdBnftDetailType2}}</span>
              <span v-show="scope.row.pdBnftType=='M'">{{$t('i18nView.noneSelect')}}</span>
            </template>
          </el-table-column>
          <el-table-column :label="$t('i18nView.guaranteeCode')" align="center"
                           prop="pdBnftCode"></el-table-column>
          <el-table-column :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.securityName')" align="center"
                           prop="pdBnftName"></el-table-column>
          <el-table-column :label="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.personalInsuranceType')" align="center"
                           prop="pdBnftDutyType">
            <template slot-scope="scope">
              <cus-select v-model="scope.row.pdBnftDutyType" :placeholder="$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.pleaseSelect')" filterable allow-create :filter="listFilterSelected(scope.row.pdBnftType,scope.row.pdBnftDetailType)" :codetype="'pdsbnftdutytype'">
              </cus-select>
            </template>
          </el-table-column>
        </el-table>
        <el-row>
          <el-button  size="small" @click="showMore" type="text" v-if="!!needShowMore && !showAll">
            {{ $t('pdtempPdInv.inv_more') }}
            <i class="el-icon-arrow-down"></i>
          </el-button>
          <el-button  size="small" @click="showBack" type="text" v-if="!!needShowMore && showAll">
            {{ $t('pdtempPdInv.inv_retract')}}
            <i class="el-icon-arrow-up"></i>
          </el-button>
        </el-row>


        <!--按钮-->
        <el-form-item id="boxFixed" :class="{'is_fixed' : isFixed}" style="float: right">
          <el-button  size="small" type="primary" @click="onSubmit()" v-auth="'pdtemp-pd-rpt-info:add'" v-show="!this.buttonShow" icon="el-icon-success">{{$t('table.save')}}</el-button>
          <el-button  size="small" type="primary" @click="onSubmit()" v-auth="'pdtemp-pd-rpt-info:add'" v-show="this.buttonShow" icon="el-icon-success">{{$t('table.update')}}</el-button>
          <el-button  size="small" type="primary" @click="clearForm()"  icon="el-icon-refresh">{{$t('table.refresh')}}</el-button>
          <el-button  size="small" type="primary" v-show="false" @click="onSelect(4)" v-auth="'pdtemp-pd-rpt-info:select'">{{$t('i18nView.query')}}
          </el-button>
        </el-form-item>
      </el-form>
    </el-main>
    <div :class="{ 'showDiv': this.showPageFlag == 1 }"></div>
  </el-container>
</template>

<script>
  import {
    addPdtempPdRptInfo,
    queryPdtempPdRptInfo,
    selectPdtempPdRptInfo,getBnftList,getPdsBnftDutyTypeList,addTable
  } from "@/api/basicinfo/pdtemppdrptinfo";
  import {pdtempPdClsLabList} from "@/api/basicinfo/ProductAttributeDefinition"
  import {mapGetters} from 'vuex'
  let _this
  export default {
    name: 'pdtempPdRptInfo',
    computed: {
      ...mapGetters([
        'tenantCode'
      ])
    },
    filters: {
      filter_pdBnftDetailType(code) {
        return _this.getCodeName('pdBnftType', code)
      },
      filter_pdBnftType(code) {
        return _this.getCodeName('pdBnftType', code)
      },
      filter_pdBnftDetailType1(code) {
        return _this.getCodeName("pdclmbnfttype2", code);
      },
      filter_pdBnftDetailType2(code) {
        return _this.getCodeName("pdsbnftnjxl", code);
      },
    },
    data() {
      _this = this
      return {
        buttonShow:false,
        pageTitle:'产品监管属性定义',
        formTitle:'监管基础属性',
        formTitle1:'产品保障信息',
        tableTitle:'产品保障',
        isFixed: false,
        parameterFixed: true,
        finelinesRegionFilter: '',
        showPageFlag: 0,
        singleTable1: [],
        data_cv: [],
        projectJbrUserlist: [],
        pdCode:'',
        showAll: false,
        needShowMore: false,
        showBnft: false,
        form: {
          pdInfoId: '',
          medicalInsuranceType: '',
          pdGroupOneType: '',
          mediumShortType: '',
          pdVerId: '1',
          pdInsuOrgCode: '',
          pdCircCode: '',
          pdRptState: '',
          pdRptDate: '',
          pdMaxGuarRenePeriodUnit: 'Y',
          pdGuarRenePeriodUnit: 'Y',
          pdType: '',
          pdDsType: '',
          pdGrpFlag: '',
          pdMainSubFlag: '',
          pdSaleFlag: '',
          pdSex: '',
          pdFatca: '',
          pdFna: '',
          pdCrs: '',
          pdOiu: '',
          pdDetailType: '',
          pdPsc: '',
          pdInsuAccFlag: '',
          pdTermType: '',
          pdReneType: '',
          pdChgFeeFlag: '',
          pdPolicyFeeFlag: '',
          pdInitFeeFlag: '',
          pdGuarReneFlag: '',
          pdOpenArea: '',
          pdSaleChan: [],
          pdAssumIntRate: '',
          pdMinIntRate: '',
          pdStartDate: '',
          pdStopDate: '9999-12-31',
          pdTaxRate: '',
          pdTaxRateVailDate: '',
          pdTaxRateExpDate: '',
          pdMinAppAge: '',
          pdMaxAppAge: '',
          pdGuarRenePeriod: '',
          pdMaxGuarReneAge: '',
          pdHesiDays: '',
          pdLoanRate: '',
          pdLoanPeriod: '',
          pdDivType: '',
          pdAnnuType: '',
          pdAnnuPeriod: '',
          pdSpecBusFlag: '',
          pdSpecBusCode: '',
          pdBrkThrSocFlag: '',
          pdDesHospFlag: '',
          pdWaitPeriod: '',
          pdMajDisCovNum: '',
          pdMilDisCovNum: '',
          pdMajPayNum: '',
          pdMilPayNum: '',
          pdMajorPayMode: '',
          pdMajBnftAftFlag: '',
          pdSpecHosFlag: '',
          pdMediCovArea: '',
          pdBeduType: '',
          pdBeduInMed: '',
          pdBeduOutMed: '',
          pdBeduRateInMed: '',
          pdBeduRateOutMed: '',
          pdPayRateInMed: '',
          pdPayRateOutMed: '',
          pdOperAlloFlag: '',
          operator: '',
          pdMainSubType: '',
          GuaranteedRenewalPeriodAge: '',
          pdSpecialBusinessFlag: '',
          pdSpecialBusinessCode: '',
          CriticalIllnessBenefitPaymentMethod: '',
          TerminationIllness: '',
          pdSpecialFlag: '',
        },
        //检验规则
        rules: {
          pdInsuOrgCode: [{required: true, message: this.$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.msgselect'), trigger: 'blur'},],/*保险机构代码*/
          pdRptState: [{required: true, message: this.$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.msgselect'), trigger: 'blur'},],   /*产品报备状态*/

          pdStartDate: [{
            required: true,
            message: this.$t('i18nView.datePlaceholder'),
            trigger: 'change'
          }, {required: true, message: this.$t('i18nView.datePlaceholder'), trigger: 'blur'}],/*产品起售日期*/
          pdType: [{required: true, message: this.$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.msgselect'), trigger: 'blur'},],   /*产品类型*/
          pdDetailType: [{required: true, message: this.$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.msgselect'), trigger: 'blur'},],   /*产品类型*/

          pdRptDate: [{required: true, message: this.$t('i18nView.datePlaceholder'), trigger: 'change'}, {
            required: true,
            message: this.$t('i18nView.datePlaceholder'),
            trigger: 'blur'
          }],
          pdGrpFlag: [{required: true, message: this.$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.msgselect'), trigger: 'change'},],


          pdTermType: [{required: true, message: this.$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.msgselect'), trigger: 'change'}],
          /* pdTaxRate: [{ required: true, message: this.$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.msgiuput'), trigger: 'blur'}],*/
          /*pdMinIntRate: [{ required: true, message: this.$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.msgiuput'), trigger: 'blur'}],*/

          pdOpenArea: [{required: true, message: this.$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.msgselect'), trigger: 'change'}],
          pdDsType: [{required: true, message: this.$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.msgselect'), trigger: 'change'}],
          pdGuarRenePeriod: [{ required: true, message: this.$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.msgiuput'), trigger: 'blur'}],
          pdSaleChan: [{required: true, message: this.$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.msgselect'), trigger: 'change'}],
          pdHesiDays: [{required: true, message: this.$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.msgiuput'), trigger: 'blur'}],
          /* pdWaitPeriod: [{required: true, message: this.$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.msgiuput'), trigger: 'blur'}],*/
          /* pdLoanRate: [{ required: true, message: this.$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.msgiuput'), trigger: 'blur'}],*/
          /*pdLoanPeriod: [{ required: true, message: this.$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.msgiuput'), trigger: 'blur'}],*/
          pdMinAppAge: [{required: true, message: this.$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.msgiuput'), trigger: 'blur'}],
          pdMaxAppAge: [{required: true, message: this.$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.msgiuput'), trigger: 'blur'}],
          /*pdMajDisCovNum: [{ required: true, message: this.$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.msgiuput'), trigger: 'blur'}],
          pdMilDisCovNum: [{ required: true, message: this.$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.msgiuput'), trigger: 'blur'}],*/

          /*pdMajPayNum: [{ required: true, message: this.$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.msgiuput'), trigger: 'blur'}],*/
          /*pdMilPayNum: [{ required: true, message: this.$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.msgiuput'), trigger: 'blur'}],*/
          // pdAnnuPeriod: [{ required: true, message: this.$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.msgiuput'), trigger: 'blur'}],
          /*pdBeduInMed: [{ required: true, message: this.$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.msgiuput'), trigger: 'blur'}],
          pdBeduOutMed: [{ required: true, message: this.$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.msgiuput'), trigger: 'blur'}],*/
          /* pdBeduRateInMed: [{ required: true, message: this.$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.msgiuput'), trigger: 'blur'}],
           pdBeduRateOutMed: [{ required: true, message: this.$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.msgiuput'), trigger: 'blur'}],*/
          /*pdPayRateInMed: [{ required: true, message: this.$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.msgiuput'), trigger: 'blur'}],*/
          /*pdPayRateOutMed: [{ required: true, message: this.$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.msgiuput'), trigger: 'blur'}],*/
          /*
          pdMaxGuarReneAge: [{ required: true, message: this.$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.msgiuput'), trigger: 'blur'}],*/

          /*pdAssumIntRate: [{ required: true, message: this.$t('pdtempPdRptInfo.msgiuput'), trigger: 'blur'}],*/


        }
      }
    },
    mounted() {
      // window.addEventListener('scroll', this.initHeight)
      // this.$nextTick(() => {
      //   this.offsetTop = document.querySelector('#boxFixed').offsetTop;
      // })
    },
    created() {
      let pdtempPdInfo = this.getPdData()
      this.form.pdInfoId = pdtempPdInfo.id;
      this.pdCode=pdtempPdInfo.pdCode;
      this.showPageFlag = this.$route.query.showPageFlag
      this.getDates();
      this.getBnft();
      this.getPdsBnftDutyType();
      /**/
    },

    methods: {
        /*人身责任险*/
        listFilterSelected(val1,val2){
            if (val1=='C'){
                if (val2=='1'){
                    return '1$0100$9900'
                }else if (val2=='2'){
                    return '1$0200$9900'
                }else if (val2=='3'){
                    return '1$1200$0300$9900'
                }else if (val2=='4'){
                    return '1$0400$9900'
                }else if (val2=='5'){
                    return '1$0500$9900'
                }else if (val2=='6'){
                    return'1$0600$9900'
                }else if (val2=='7'){
                    return '1$0700$0701$0702$0703$0704$0705$0706$0707$0708$0709$0710$0711$0799$9900'
                }else if (val2=='8'){
                    return '1$0800$9900'
                }else if (val2=='9'){
                    return '1$3000$9900'
                }else if (val2=='10'){
                    return '1$9900'
                }else if (val2=='11'){
                    return'1$1200$1300$9900'
                }else if (val2=='12'){
                    return '1$0300$9900'
                }else {
                    return '1$'
                }
            }else if (val1=='M'){
                if (val2=='1'){
                    return '1$1000$1100$1400'
                }else if (val2=='2'){
                    return '1$1100$1400'
                }else if (val2=='3'){
                    return '1$1000$1100$1400'
                }else if (val2=='4'){
                    return '1$1100$1400'
                }else if (val2=='5'){
                    return '1$1100$1400'
                }else if (val2=='6'){
                    return '1$0900$1100$1400'
                }else if (val2=='7'){
                    return '1$1100$1400'
                }else if (val2=='8'){
                    return '1$0100$9900'
                }else {
                    return '1$'
                }
            }else if (val1=='A'){
                if (val2=='2'){
                    return '1$1000$1100$1400'
                }else if (val2=='1'){
                    return '1$1100$1400'
                }else if (val2=='3'){
                    return '1$1000$1100$1400'
                }else if (val2=='4'){
                    return '1$1100$1400'
                }else if (val2=='5'){
                    return '1$1100$1400'
                }else if (val2=='6'){
                    return '1$0900$1100$1400'
                }else if (val2=='7'){
                    return '1$1100$1400'
                }else if (val2=='8'){
                    return '1$0100$9900'
                }else {
                    return '1$'
                }
            }
        },
        /*初始化页面加载数据*/
        getDates: function () {
            queryPdtempPdRptInfo(this.form.pdInfoId).then(response => {
                if (response.data) {
                    this.form = response.data;
                      let keys = Object.keys(response.data);
                      for(var i=0;i< keys.length;i++){
                          if(response.data[keys[i]] != null ){
                              this.form[keys[i]] = response.data[keys[i]]
                          }else{
                              this.form[keys[i]] = ""
                          }
                      }
                    this.form.pdInsuOrgCode = this.tenantCode;
                    if (response.data.pdSaleChan) {
                        this.form.pdSaleChan = JSON.parse(response.data.pdSaleChan);
                    }else {
                        this.form.pdSaleChan =[]
                    }
                    this.$nextTick(() => {
                        this.findPdBonusModeAndGrpFlag()
                    })
                }
            }).catch(error => {
                console.log(error);
            });
        },
      showMore() {
        this.showAll = true
        this.singleTable1 = this.data_cv
      },
      showBack() {
        this.showAll = false
        this.singleTable1 = this.data_cv.slice(0, 10)
      },
      getPdsBnftDutyType(){
        getPdsBnftDutyTypeList(this.buildRequestData({})).then(res=>{
          for (let data of res.data) {
            let option = {code:'', codeName:''};
            option.code = data.code;
            option.codeName = data.codeName;
            this.projectJbrUserlist.push(option);
          }
        })
      },
      getBnft(){
        getBnftList(this.buildRequestData({"pdCode":this.pdCode})).then(res=>{
          this.singleTable1=res.data
        })
      },
      showThis(){
        // this.$router.push({path: '/api/pdtemp-pd-bnft/base', query: {showPageFlag: '1'}})
         //页面跳转按钮
         this.$router.push({name: '保障定义', query: {showPageFlag: '1'},params:this.getPdData()})
      },
      //查找产品分红方式和险种性质
      findPdBonusModeAndGrpFlag() {
        pdtempPdClsLabList(this.form.pdInfoId).then(response => {
          for (let i = 0; i < response.data.length; i++) {
            if (response.data[i].pdClsType == 1) {
              this.form.pdDivType = response.data[i].pdCls10;
              this.form.pdMainSubFlag = response.data[i].pdCls5;
            }
              if (response.data[i].pdClsType == 2) {
                  let pdGrpFlag = response.data[i].pdCls25
                  if (pdGrpFlag == 'G') {
                      this.form.pdGrpFlag = '02'
                  } else if (pdGrpFlag == 'I') {
                      this.form.pdGrpFlag = '01'
                  } else {
                      this.form.pdGrpFlag = '99'
                  }
              }
          }
        })
          if (this.form.pdRptDate){
              this.buttonShow=true;
          }else {
              this.buttonShow=false;
          }
      },
      /*页面高度监听*/
      initHeight() {
        let scrollTop = window.pageYOffset || document.documentElement.scrollTop || document.body.scrollTop;
        this.isFixed = scrollTop < this.offsetTop ? true : false
      },

      /*保证续保标记*/

      changeXBFlag(flag) {
        if (flag == 'N') {
          this.form.pdGuarRenePeriod = '';
          this.form.pdMaxGuarReneAge = '';
        }
      },

      /*产品明细*/
      typeRegionSelect(val) {
        if (val == '13000') {
          this.finelinesRegionFilter = '1$13100$13200$13300'
        } else if (val == '14000') {
          this.finelinesRegionFilter = '1$14100$14200'
        } else if (val == '15000') {
          this.finelinesRegionFilter = '1$15100$15200$15300$15400'
        } else if (val == '16000') {
          this.finelinesRegionFilter = '1$16000'
        } else {
          this.finelinesRegionFilter = ''
        }
      },

      /*数据保存*/
      onSubmit() {
        this.$refs.form.validate((valid) => {
          if (valid) {
              let map={
                  "im":this.form
              }
            addPdtempPdRptInfo(this.buildRequestData(map)).then(response => {
              if (response.code == 200) {
                /*alert(response.message);*/
                /*this.$refs.form.resetFields();*/
                this.$emit('childFn', true);
                addTable(this.buildRequestData({"PdtempPdBnft":this.singleTable1})).then(res=>{
                  this.notifySuccess(response.message);
                })
              }
            }).catch(error => {
              console.log(error);
            });
          } else {
            this.focusItem()
            return false;
          }
        });
      },
      //初始化表单
      clearForm() {
        this.$refs.form.resetFields();
          let pdtempPdInfo = this.getPdData();
          this.form.pdInfoId = pdtempPdInfo.id;
          this.pdCode=pdtempPdInfo.pdCode;
          this.showPageFlag = this.$route.query.showPageFlag;
          this.getDates();
          this.getBnft();
          this.getPdsBnftDutyType();
      },
      /*查询按钮*/
      onSelect(num) {
        let that = this;
        selectPdtempPdRptInfo(num).then(response => {
          that.form = response.data;
        })
      }
    },
    destroyed() {
      window.removeEventListener('scroll', this.handleScroll)
    }
  }
</script>
<style lang="scss" scoped>


  .is_fixed {
    position: fixed;
    right: 10px;
    bottom: 1px;
    z-index: 999;
    background-color: #ecf3f30d;
    top: auto;
    left: 88%;
  }


  .showDiv {
    width: 90%;
    height: 100%;
    margin-top: -40px;
    margin-left: -40px;
    position: absolute;
    background: #ffffff00;
    z-index: 999;
  }

</style>
